categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starship classes

nodes.text: The Freighter Type C was a medium-sized cargo freighter manufactured by Yuung, Tygg & Josse Engineering.
This common light freighter was found throughout the galaxy, and was YTJ Corporation's first attempt to satisfy the demand for an economical transport.
Unarmed and only lightly armored, the Type C was best deployed as part of a convoy for safety, as its top speed was far slower than even the most primitive starfighter.
